page.title: 02HOME LIFE
page.content: Mr. and Mrs. L. live in Littleworth Lane, Monk Bretton. Their{homelife}is simple but pleasent. Mr. and Mrs. L. work hard. They own a{shop}which sells flowers, fruit, vegetables and {pet}foods, and Mr. L. works as a civil engineer. The familiy consists of Mr. and Mrs. L. and two sons, John aged thirteen and Athony aged ten. They like to use their home as a place to relax from the pressures of work. They like to sit in their garden on sunny days and the neighbourhood is friendly and the boys have plenty of friends to play with.
